author: stsp
msg: Revert a bit of over-engineering introduced in r37349.
* subversion/libsvn_client/patch.c
(resolve_target_path): Don't create missing directories here.
We don't even know yet if we have any hunks to apply to the
target file. And we don't want to be creating thousands of directories
just because someone passed a wrong strip count, or applied a patch to
the wrong path in the working copy, for example.
It's safer to just skip targets if their containing directories do not
exist, at least until we've figured out how to avoid associated problems.
(init_patch_target): Fix typo in comment while here.

author: stsp
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/patch.c
(copy_lines_to_target, read_lines_from_target): Don't ignore errors
returned by svn_stream_close().
Found by: gstein

author: stsp
msg: Various target-file-related improvements to svn patch.
* subversion/libsvn_client/patch.c
(patch_target_t): Make abs_path non-const so we can pass it to
svn_dirent_is_under_root(). Allow for the 'file' member to be
NULL in case the target file is absent.
(resolve_target_path): Add 'exists' output argument which upon
indicates whether the target file already exists.
Sanitize target path validation by using svn_dirent_is_under_root().
Try to create non-existent parent directories of the target path.
(init_patch_target): Only try to open the target file if it exists.
When checking for local mods, consider that directories of the target
path may be unversioned, e.g. if resolve_target_path() created them.
(apply_one_patch): Only read from target file if it exists.
(apply_one_hunk): As previous, and if it does not exist, use an empty
string as latest text. This always creates a conflict in the created
file, we might want to make this a bit smarter later.

author: neels
msg: Enhance interesting little script that analyzes what committers touched.
It can now step into selected subdirectories.
* tools/dev/analyze-svnlogs.py
(get_key): New function to determine the summary key for a path.
(print_report): Add parameter sectionroots, to indicate directories that
should be stepped into by one level instead of being summarized as one.
If sectionroots == [ ], this function behaves like it used to.
Call new function get_key() to implement use of that list.
Also make sure tags and branches are listed only once (now necessary).
(run): Pass some default sectionroots to print_report().

author: stsp
msg: * subversion/include/svn_dirent_uri.h
Update copyright year while here.
(svn_dirent_is_under_root): Add @since marker.
Found by: arfrever
